Title: 42004 - When Is it Time to Accept Credit Cards?
Direction: 500 words. List 3-6 reasons why a business owner should consider accepting credit cards. Examples can include credit cards help businesses sell online and seem more legitimate to customers. Your audience consists of business owners who are interested in staying up to date with the latest news and information on various topics such as tech, lifestyle, sports, etc. The target URL discusses high-risk merchant accounts, so discuss how even these merchants can accept credit cards.

Title: 42005 - # Best Practices for Selling Handmade Items
Direction: 500 words. List 3-6 business tips for artists who are interested in selling their handmade items. Ideas can include having great pictures and descriptions and selling local as well as selling online. The potential audience ranges from CEOs to business students, and they're interested in businesses being a force for good. The target URL discusses high-risk merchants, so one tip is that even small, startup businesses can get a credit card processing service to sell online.

Title: 42006 - Top # Alternatives to Etsy
Direction: 500 words. List 3-6 websites artists can consider if they don't want to sell their handmade goods on Etsy. Choose websites for a variety of different craft items and explain why they are popular with sellers. The potential audience is interested in personal finance and ways to make extra money. To incorporate the target URL, which discusses high-risk credit card merchants, include one alternative that talks about making your own website and selling online.

Title: 42007 - # Tips to Make Your E-commerce Business a Success
Direction: 500 words. List 3-6 tips a business owner can implement to increase the success of his or her e-commerce business. Tips can include suggestions such as focusing on the social elements of the business or making sure the e-commerce business is set up for easy mobile shopping. The potential audience is interested in reinventing their careers, so their e-commerce business might be a side job or a second career. Title: 42008 - The Complicated Nature of Credit Cards
Direction: 500 words. Make a list of three to six sections exploring the pros and cons businesses face when they accept credit cards. One the positive side, customers find it a convenient way to pay for their purchases. On the negative side, merchants have to pay processing fees just to accept cards. You can mention the client URL and keyword in a section about how some credit card companies don't want to work with certain types of businesses, and High Risk Pay offers an alternative. Your target audience is interested in information about finances, credit cards, etc.
